name: Solar Smash 2
description:
Solar Smash 2 is a planet destruction simulator. You can use various weapons to destroy Earth and other planets of solar system.

Warning:
This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

Discord
